t: Amazon.com: Lethal Prey (A Prey Novel Book 35) eBook : Sandford, John: Books
s: Everything in the novel went according ... and then Sanford threw in an ending that the reader could not possibly see coming. It’s a great, but unexpected ending. Could there be a sequel in the making, or do we as readers simply have to use our imaginations about whether or not THIS suspect/antagonist will go unpunished? I love the Prey series. ... after I read the first Davenport novel I went to a book store and bought all available others (15) at once and subsequently read all of John Sandford's ...
